GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.2
GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: validate BOOT sectors_per_clusters

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit a2b6986316a2d106f6951e76db70fa4b2fde64a9, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 82cae269cfa953032fbb8980a7d554d60fb00b17. For more details please see the references link.
